ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: If you do not have iman in me, then at least leave me alone.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: If you do not believe in me, leave me alone."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But if you do not believe what I say, leave me alone (and desist from laying hands on me).”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If you do not want to believe, leave me alone".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And if you do not believe in me, then have no relation with me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But if you believe me not, then keep away from me and leave me alone."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And if you do not believe in me, then leave me alone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But if so be that you believe me not, go you apart from me!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And if ye put no faith in me, then let me go.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: If you do not believe in me, at least keep away from me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And if ye will not believe in me, then let me alone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And if you do not believe me, keep out of my way.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: If ye believe me not, at least keep yourselves away from me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But if you believe me not, then keep away from me and leave me alone."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And if you do not believe me, then leave me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But if you do not believe in me, keep away from me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But if you do not believe me, then leave me alone."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [44:21] And if you do not believe me, then stay away from me’, [that is] then refrain from harming me — but they did not refrain from such [action].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And if ye put no faith in me) and if you do not believe in the message I bring you, (then let me go) then leave me alone, neither harmed by you nor benefiting from you.
